item.title: CVE-2024-43995|2024-09-18T14:35:20.487Z -- sonalsinha21 -- posterity
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in sonalsinha21 Posterity allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Posterity: from n/a through 3.6.
